verses.text: And the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, saying ,
Son of man , set thy face toward Jerusalem , and drop \add thy word\add* toward the holy places , and prophesy against the land of Israel ,

And say to the land of Israel , Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; Behold, I \add am\add* against thee, and will draw forth my sword out of his sheath , and will cut off from thee the righteous and the wicked.
Seeing then that I will cut off from thee the righteous and the wicked , therefore shall my sword go forth out of his sheath against all flesh from the south to the north :
That all flesh may know that I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* have drawn forth my sword out of his sheath : it shall not return any more.
Sigh therefore, thou son of man , with the breaking of \add thy\add* loins ; and with bitterness sigh before their eyes.

And it shall be, when they say unto thee, Wherefore sighest thou? that thou shalt answer , For the tidings ; because it cometh : and every heart shall melt , and all hands shall be feeble , and every spirit shall faint , and all knees shall be weak \add as\add* water : behold, it cometh , and shall be brought to pass , saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 21.7 \ft shall be weak…: Heb. shall go into water\f* \p
¶ Again the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, saying ,
Son of man , prophesy , and say , Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; Say , A sword , a sword is sharpened , and also furbished :

It is sharpened to make a sore slaughter ; it is furbished that it may glitter : should we then make mirth ? it contemneth the rod of my son , \add as\add* every tree.\f + \fr 21.10 \ft it contemneth…: or, it is the rod of my son, it despiseth every tree\f*
And he hath given it to be furbished , that it may be handled : this sword is sharpened , and it is furbished , to give it into the hand of the slayer.

Cry and howl , son of man : for it shall be upon my people , it \add shall be\add* upon all the princes of Israel : terrors by reason of the sword shall be upon my people : smite therefore upon \add thy\add* thigh.\f + \fr 21.12 \ft terrors…: or, they are thrust down to the sword with my people\f*

Because \add it is\add* a trial , and what if \add the sword\add* contemn even the rod ? it shall be no \add more\add*, saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 21.13 \ft Because…: or, When the trial hath been, what then? shall they not also belong to the despising rod?\f*

Thou therefore, son of man , prophesy , and smite \add thine\add* hands together , and let the sword be doubled the third time, the sword of the slain : it \add is\add* the sword of the great \add men that are\add* slain , which entereth into their privy chambers.\f + \fr 21.14 \ft hands…: Heb. hand to hand\f*

I have set the point of the sword against all their gates , that \add their\add* heart may faint , and \add their\add* ruins be multiplied : ah ! \add it is\add* made bright , \add it is\add* wrapped up for the slaughter.\f + \fr 21.15 \ft point: or, glittering, or, fear\f*\f + \fr 21.15 \ft wrapped up: or, sharpened\f*
Go thee one way or other , \add either\add* on the right hand , \add or\add* on the left , whithersoever thy face \add is\add* set.\f + \fr 21.16 \ft or on…: Heb. set thyself, take the left hand\f*
I will also smite mine hands together , and I will cause my fury to rest : I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* have said \add it\add*. \p
¶ The word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me again, saying ,

Also, thou son of man , appoint thee two ways , that the sword of the king of Babylon may come : both twain shall come forth out of one land : and choose thou a place , choose \add it\add* at the head of the way to the city.
Appoint a way , that the sword may come to Rabbath of the Ammonites , and to Judah in Jerusalem the defenced.

For the king of Babylon stood at the parting of the way , at the head of the two ways , to use divination : he made \add his\add* arrows bright , he consulted with images , he looked in the liver.\f + \fr 21.21 \ft parting of: Heb. mother of\f*\f + \fr 21.21 \ft arrows: or, knives\f*\f + \fr 21.21 \ft images: Heb. teraphim\f*

At his right hand was the divination for Jerusalem , to appoint captains , to open the mouth in the slaughter , to lift up the voice with shouting , to appoint \add battering\add* rams against the gates , to cast a mount , \add and\add* to build a fort.\f + \fr 21.22 \ft captains: or, battering rams: Heb. rams\f*

And it shall be unto them as a false divination in their sight , to them that have sworn oaths : but he will call to remembrance the iniquity , that they may be taken.\f + \fr 21.23 \ft to them…: or, for the oaths made unto them\f*

Therefore thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Because ye have made your iniquity to be remembered , in that your transgressions are discovered , so that in all your doings your sins do appear ; because, \add I say\add*, that ye are come to remembrance , ye shall be taken with the hand. \p
¶ And thou, profane wicked prince of Israel , whose day is come , when iniquity \add shall have\add* an end ,

Thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Remove the diadem , and take off the crown : this \add shall\add* not \add be\add* the same : exalt \add him that is\add* low , and abase \add him that is\add* high.

I will overturn , overturn , overturn , it: and it shall be no \add more\add*, until he come whose right it is; and I will give it \add him\add*.\f + \fr 21.27 \ft I will overturn…: Heb. Perverted, perverted, perverted, will I make it\f* \p

¶ And thou, son of man , prophesy and say , Thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* concerning the Ammonites , and concerning their reproach ; even say thou, The sword , the sword \add is\add* drawn : for the slaughter \add it is\add* furbished , to consume because of the glittering :

Whiles they see vanity unto thee, whiles they divine a lie unto thee, to bring thee upon the necks of \add them that are\add* slain , of the wicked , whose day is come , when their iniquity \add shall have\add* an end.
Shall I cause \add it\add* to return into his sheath ? I will judge thee in the place where thou wast created , in the land of thy nativity.\f + \fr 21.30 \ft Shall…: or, Cause it to return\f*

And I will pour out mine indignation upon thee, I will blow against thee in the fire of my wrath , and deliver thee into the hand of brutish men , \add and\add* skilful to destroy.\f + \fr 21.31 \ft brutish: or, burning\f*
Thou shalt be for fuel to the fire ; thy blood shall be in the midst of the land ; thou shalt be no \add more\add* remembered : for I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* have spoken \add it\add*.
